name: Me, me & me
description:
Me, me & me

A game about time travel

You are locked in a mysterious laboratory.

To escape, you will need your power of temporal multiplication.
With more and more version of yourself, will you find the solutions to the rooms?

You can download the executable if you want to fully enjoy the experience.

Made by:

  •  Baud Alexandre
  • Gonelle Alexis
  • Jungo Quentin
  • Philagor Benjamin
  • & Me

Source: 

We use custom the great following asset: https://petricakegames.itch.io/cosmic-lilac
The music were made by: Quentin Jungo   
Some sound were custom made and other were taken from the following link: https://opengameart.org/content/8-wet-squish-slurp-impacts https://opengameart.org/content/platformer-sounds-terminal-interaction-door-shot...
